sentence.Network_en: The bird species of greatest concern, such as the Great Hornbill, are found in or near forests.
sentence.Network_cn: 在森林附近或者森林里面发现了备受关注的鸟类，如大犀鸟。

sentence.Network_en: A rhinoceros hornbill - one of 54 species of hornbills - perches on a fig tree in Gunung Palung National Park.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只马来犀鸟 —— 54种犀鸟之中的一种 —— 栖息在婆罗洲巴隆山国家公园的一棵无花果树枝上.

sentence.Network_en: The eye of a southern ground - hornbill. The bird has remarkably long, wiry eyelashes.
sentence.Network_cn: 红脸地犀鸟之眼. 这种鸟有注目的细长的睫毛.
